ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: Application schema, Planned Land Use
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines requirements associated with the application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance class: 'Application schema, Planned Land Use'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Land Use'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Code list values
TestCase.description:
Verify whether all attributes whose value type is a code list take the values set out therein.

Source: Code list values

TestAssertion.label: lu-plu-as.a.1: hilucsLandUse code list value
TestAssertion.description: Check code list value for hilucsLandUse
TestAssertion.expression: let $codelist := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/HILUCSValue' let $codelisturl := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/HILUCSValue/HILUCSValue.en.xml' let $valid_href := fn:doc($codelisturl)/*:codelist/*:containeditems/*:value/@id let $features_selected := $features[self::plu:SpatialPlan] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $envDoms := $feature/plu:hilucsLandUse return if(not($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'hilucsLandUse'}) else for $envDom in $envDoms return if(not($envDom/@xlink:href)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingAttribute', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'hilucsLandUse', 'attribute': 'xlink:href'}) else if(not($envDom/@xlink:href = $valid_href)) then local:addMessage('TR.disallowedCodeListValue', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'hilucsLandUse', 'value': string($envDom/@xlink:href), 'codelist': $codelist}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: lu-plu-as.a.2: levelOfSpatialPlan code list value
TestAssertion.description: Check code list value for levelOfSpatialPlan
TestAssertion.expression: let $codelist := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/LevelOfSpatialPlanValue' let $codelisturl := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/LevelOfSpatialPlanValue/LevelOfSpatialPlanValue.en.xml' let $valid_href := fn:doc($codelisturl)/*:codelist/*:containeditems/*:value/@id let $features_selected := $features[self::plu:SpatialPlan] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $envDoms := $feature/plu:levelOfSpatialPlan return if(not($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'levelOfSpatialPlan'}) else if(count($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicity', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'element': 'levelOfSpatialPlan', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($envDoms)}) else for $envDom in $envDoms return if(not($envDom/@xlink:href)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingAttribute', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'levelOfSpatialPlan', 'attribute': 'xlink:href'}) else if(not($envDom/@xlink:href = $valid_href)) then local:addMessage('TR.disallowedCodeListValue', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'levelOfSpatialPlan', 'value': string($envDom/@xlink:href), 'codelist': $codelist}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: lu-plu-as.a.3: processStepGeneral code list value
TestAssertion.description: Check code list value for processStepGeneral
TestAssertion.expression: let $codelist := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/ProcessStepGeneralValue' let $codelisturl := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/ProcessStepGeneralValue/ProcessStepGeneralValue.en.xml' let $valid_href := fn:doc($codelisturl)/*:codelist/*:containeditems/*:value/@id let $features_selected := $features[self::plu:SpatialPlan] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $envDoms := $feature/plu:processStepGeneral return if(not($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'processStepGeneral'}) else if(count($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicity', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'element': 'processStepGeneral', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($envDoms)}) else for $envDom in $envDoms return if(exists($envDom/@xlink:href) and not($envDom/@xlink:href = $valid_href)) then local:addMessage('TR.disallowedCodeListValue', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'processStepGeneral', 'value': string($envDom/@xlink:href), 'codelist': $codelist}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: lu-plu-as.a.4: regulationNature code list value
TestAssertion.description: Check code list value for regulationNature
TestAssertion.expression: let $codelist := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/RegulationNatureValue' let $codelisturl := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/RegulationNatureValue/RegulationNatureValue.en.xml' let $valid_href := fn:doc($codelisturl)/*:codelist/*:containeditems/*:value/@id let $features_selected := $features[self::plu:SpatialPlan] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $envDoms := $feature/plu:regulationNature return if(not($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'regulationNature'}) else if(count($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongMultiplicity', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'element': 'regulationNature', 'multiplicity': 1, 'count': count($envDoms)}) else for $envDom in $envDoms return if(not($envDom/@xlink:href)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingAttribute', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'regulationNature', 'attribute': 'xlink:href'}) else if(not($envDom/@xlink:href = $valid_href)) then local:addMessage('TR.disallowedCodeListValue', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'regulationNature', 'value': string($envDom/@xlink:href), 'codelist': $codelist}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: Constraints
TestCase.description: Verify that the features provided in the dataset adhere to the constraints specified in the INSPIRE application schema.

TestAssertion.label: lu-plu-as.b.1: Attributes legislationCitation, regulationText or planDocument
TestAssertion.description: Check that at least one of the attributes legislationCitation, regulationText or planDocument is populated with a non-void value.
